titles.title: Sea Turtle Rescue Assistance and Rehabilitation Act of 2025
Sea Turtle Rescue Assistance and Rehabilitation Act of 2025
Sea Turtle Rescue Assistance and Rehabilitation Act of 2025
A bill to require the Secretary of Commerce to establish the Sea Turtle Rescue Assistance Grant Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cruz with an amendment. With written report No. 119-41.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 118.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
